fields.name: Stand Name:
fields.value:
Tower of Gray
Attack: Powerful
Defense: none

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Attack a target at night
-Increase awareness for the night, causing any attacks that are basic and below to miss

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-The first two attacks directed at you will instead give the attacker the message “your target was too difficult to hit. You’ve completely missed!”
-Attacks that rampage or kill all visitors will succeed
